data.message: Design critique framework for fintech landing pages: 1) "Template smell" - if structure is hero+stats+features+testimonials+CTA, need 2+ unique moments that feel ownable (process diagram, impact framework, regional emphasis). 2) Specificity beats abstraction - show exact deal types, region tags, verification badges not generic "AI Deal Discovery". 3) Social proof must read as proof not decoration - logo rows need contrast/containers. 4) Financial claims like "32% returns" trigger skepticism - reframe as "Top 20%" or "up to X" with disclaimers.
